Module com.example.anti_cafe
Package com.example.anti_cafe

Class ArchiveWindow

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
com.example.anti_cafe.MainWindow
com.example.anti_cafe.TableCloseWindow
com.example.anti_cafe.ArchiveWindow
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionForButtonArchive, ActionForButtonCloseTable
public class ArchiveWindow extends TableCloseWindow implements ActionForButtonArchive
Class responsible for displaying the archive user interface, which includes information about revenue, average table reservation time, the most popular table, and the table with the highest profit.
